name: The Deadly Dungeons of Baron Backslash
name_original: The Deadly Dungeons of Baron Backslash
description:
A fiendishly challenging retro pixel-art dungeon escape game. Can you defeat the dastardly Baron and escape his hideous prison?

The game is currently fully playable and complete for now (although if you find a bug please let me know so I can squish it), but I would like to continue to add more creatures, items, dungeon variety, bosses and other surprises as long as there is any demand. So... if you enjoy the game please share it and leave a comment to give me some encouragement!

Keep 'hall of fame' usernames clean please - anything gratuitous will be unceremoniously removed!

Huge thanks to 0x72 for his utterly awesome dungeon tileset, which the whole game is founded on - and to IceCreamYou for developing and sharing MainLoop.js. which is central to the game engine.
